function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fecal-oral transmission from improper waste disposal practices","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases, clogging sewage systems, and disrupting pumping stations","Mitigation":"Use advanced wastewater treatment, spread awareness of proper waste disposal, and implement on-site wastewater treatment systems","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment systems, on-site wastewater treatment technology","People":"Community members, sanitation workers, public health officials","Owner":"Local government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Emergence of new solid waste from the pandemic, including contaminated medical waste and increased household waste","Impact":"Potential viral transmission, increased generation of waste, suspension of waste recycling practices","Mitigation":"Provision of dedicated bins for medical waste, sterilization of medical waste, protection of garbage collection areas from pests and rodents","Technologies":"Dedicated waste bins, waste sterilization technology","People":"Households, waste management workers, public health officials","Owner":"Local government, waste management companies"}]}
